summary: This mod add a building and a pack of unique (standalone) followers to the game.[required HDT] "Warning Adult Only 18+"
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=4]Strong Meat Hall Follower Pack[/size]

This mod add a building and a pack of unique (standalone) followers to the game.[required HDT]
"Warning Adult Only 18+"The followers of this mod are made purposely made to not support any armor mod
so they stay naked all the timeand only show some part of the vanilla armor.

Update 1.1:
Added new "cellar" on the left side of throne

All the follower of this mod are marriable completed with there own schedule and perks Enjoy.

1. Alex: One Handed Warrior/Bone Breaker
2. Alice: Assassin/Bladesman
3. Dibella: Destruction/Deep frost
4. Freya: Assassin/Bladesman
5. Karma: Two Handed Warrior/Skull Crusher
6. Petra: Two Handed Warrior/Deep Wound
7. Sigdis: Two Handed Warrior/Deep Wound
8. Tiara: Assassin/Bladesman

NEW!
1. Dana: Ranger/Overdraw
2. Hecate: Combat Mystic/Bladesman
3. Leona: Barbarian/Warmaster
4. Titania: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Two Handed Warrior/Deep Wound[/size][/font]
5. Guila: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Two Handed Warrior/[/size][/font]Limbspitter
6. Artemia: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Destruction/[/size][/font]Intanse Flames

Location:
Behaind Falkreath Hall Of the Dead
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]
[b]Recommended : [/b]
For this mod to work properly i strongly suggest that the esp file of this mod
"Fachry Petra Follower.esp" manually put on the last of your load order.[/size][/font]

Required :
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguarde.esm
Dragonborn.esm
HDT

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/url]

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder
[b]
Credit : [/b]
